卓上花・ブーゲンビリア

Table Flower, Bougainvillea
桌花：九重葛
桌花：九重葛
Tabletop Flowers, Bougainvillea
kDesc
Bougainvilleas are horn shaped, purplish red flowers.[#Legal]
Les bougainvilliers sont des fleurs rouge pourpre en forme de corne.[#Legal]
Bougainvilleas sind hornförmige, lilafarbene rote Blumen.[#Legal]
La bougainvillea ha dei fiori a forma di corno di un colore rosso che tende al violaceo.[#Legal]
Las buganvillas son flores de color rojo púrpura y con forma de cuerno.[#Legal]
ラッパの形をした赤紫の花を咲かせる、ブーゲンビリアの卓上花。[#Legal]
나팔 모양의 자주색 꽃을 피우는 탁상화 부겐빌레아. [#Legal]
A table flower named bougainvillea. The flowers are in burgundy, trumpet-shaped.[#Legal]
九重葛桌花。盛開紅紫色、喇叭型的花朵。[#Legal]
九重葛桌花。盛開紅紫色、喇叭型的花朵。[#Legal]
Bougainvilleas are horn shaped, purplish red flowers.[#Legal]
